text:
Overview
This part focuses on the real-world time series classiﬁcation problem of activity recognition
from multivariate accelerometer data recorded from a smartphone, and how to develop machine
learning and deep learning classiﬁcation models to address the problem. The tutorials in this
part do not seek to demonstrate the best way to solve the problem, instead the dataset provides
a context on which each of the speciﬁc methods can be demonstrated. As such, the performance
